statements: DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1 AND progress_percent < 50;
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE quest_id = 3 AND mission_id = 1;
DELETE FROM quests WHERE quest_name = 'Save the Village';
DELETE FROM missions WHERE quest_id IN (SELECT quest_id FROM quests WHERE quest_difficulty > 5);
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1 AND quest_id = 2 AND mission_id = 3;
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 100 AND completion_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM quest WHERE quest_difficulty > 3 AND quest_description LIKE '%difficult%';
DELETE FROM mission WHERE mission_reward < 1000 AND mission_type = 'side';
